#Declare Matrix

Entires should be one list, going down the columns
```{r, declare1}
#declare input A
A = matrix(c(3, 1, -1, 5, 2, 4), nrow = 2)
A

#declare input B
B = matrix(c(-2, 7, 9), nrow = 3)
B

#declare input C
C = matrix(c(2, 1, 0, -1), nrow = 2)
C

#create 3x3 identity matrix
I = diag(3)
I

#name rows or cols
colnames(C) = c("foo", "bar")
rownames(C) = c("baz", "qux")
C
```

#Basic manipulations

```{r, manip}
#transpose
A
t(A)
#dimension
dim(A)
dim(B)
```

#Multiplication

Need to use %\*% and not \*

```{r, mult}
#do multiplication
Z = A %*% B
Z
```
